description: Learn how to make tender, pan-fried beef steak in a classic red wine sauce with this speedy recipe that's perfect for weeknight dinners.
keywords: Beef Scotch Fillet With Red Wine Sauce
name: Beef Scotch Fillet With Red Wine Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
